endpoints.description: Retrieve the forecasted occupancy rates for specified regions and dates based on historical data.
Upload historical occupancy data to enhance forecast predictions.
Fetch predefined templates for seasonal trends applied in forecasting.
Submit regional event information to consider in trend predictions.
Obtain resource planning recommendations based on forecasted occupancy.
Retrieve optimal pricing strategies determined by predicted demand trends.
Submit feedback to adjust and fine-tune prediction algorithms.
Access suggested marketing campaigns targeting forecasted peak periods.
Remove outdated or incorrect historical data to maintain dataset accuracy.
Update configuration settings for forecasting parameters and models.
